task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 331°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, but the top is currently cut off, so I will look up.

I can now see the top and bottom of the building; by counting the visible floors (approximately 8) and assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters, I can estimate the total height to be around 28 meters.
